    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_6a85f3ed02475d6eb67f920844453e1b9e12cf28</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_6a85f3ed02475d6eb67f920844453e1b9e12cf28</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Induced e.m.f. across a conducting wire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verursachtes e.m.f. über einer Leitleitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">E.m.f. induit à travers un fil de conduite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">E.m.f. induzido através de um fio conduzindo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">E.m.f. indotto attraverso un legare di condotta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προκληθέν e.m.f. πέρα από ένα καλώδιο διεύθυνσης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">E.m.f. inducido a través de un alambre que 
conduce</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that when a conducting wire moving downward cuts across a magnetic flux, an induced current flows through it, giving rise to an induced e.m.f. across the ends of the conducting wire.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced e.m.f.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic flux</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt daß, wenn eine Leitleitung,
die abwärts Schnitte über einem magnetischen Fluß, ein 
geverursachter Strom verschiebt, ihn durchfließt und verursacht ein 
verursachtes e.m.f. über den Enden der Leitleitung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que quand un fil de 
conduite descendant les coupes à travers un flux magnétique, un 
courant induit le traverse, provoquant un e.m.f. induit à travers les
extrémités du fil de conduite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que quando um fio 
conduzindo que move cortes descendentes através de um fluxo 
magnético, uma corrente induzida corre através d, causando um e.m.f.
induzido através das extremidades do fio conduzindo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che quando un legare
di condotta che scende i tagli attraverso un cambiamento continuo 
magnetico, una corrente indotta la attraversa, provocando un e.m.f. 
indotto attraverso le estremità del legare di condotta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι όταν ένα καλώδιο
διεύθυνσης που κινεί τις προς τα κάτω αποκοπές πέρα από ένα 
μαγνητικό συλλίπασμα, προκληθείσες παρούσες ροές μέσω του, 
προκαλώντας ένα προκληθέν e.m.f. στις άκρες του καλωδίου 
διεύθυνσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que cuando un alambre 
que conduce que mueve cortes hacia abajo a través de un flux 
magnético, una corriente inducida la atraviesa, dando lugar a un 
e.m.f. inducido a través de los extremos del alambre que conduce.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geverursachter Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">verursachtes e.m.f.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetischer Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">courant induit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">e.m.f induit.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">flux magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">corrente induzida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">e.m.f induzido.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fluxo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">corrente indotta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">e.m.f indotto.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">campo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">cambiamento continuo magnetico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προκληθέν ρεύμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προκληθέν e.m.f.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαγνητική ροή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">corriente inducida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">e.m.f inducido.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">flux magnético</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
